item.title: Olivia Newton John - Blue Eyes Crying In The Rain
item.description:
In the twilight
glow I see you
Blue eyes crying
in the rain
When we kissed goodbye
and parted
I knew
we’d never meet again
Love is like
a dying ember
Only memories
remain
Through the age
I’ll remember
Blue eyes crying
in the rain-

Blue eyes crying
in the rain
Someday
when we meet up yonder
We’ll stroll hand
in hand again
In a land
that knows no parting
Blue eyes crying
in the rain-
